content.value:
Anyone wanna know what Parler are trying to put together from other hosting providers that aren't AWS? 

Read this spec list. 

Good luck with this outside of AWS. Rob Monster of Epik Hosting won't be able to give them this kinda grunt with his shitty white-label reseller acct.
